column2: "Emumuyɛfo guan wɔ aber a nyimpa biara nntaa hɔn do: Na atseneneefo dze
column3: wɔyɛ ndam dɛ ogyata."

column2: "Asaase do mbrato ntsi na no mu ahemfo dɔɔ so: Na ɔnam nyimpa ntseaseefo na nyimdzefo do na n’ahendzi bɛkyɛr."
"Ohianyi a ɔhaw ɔbɔbɔfo no Ɔtse dɛ nsu a ɔpra adze kɔ na ɔmma edziban mmba."
"Hɔn a wɔpow mbra no woyi emumuyɛfo ayɛw: Na hɔn a wosie mbra no dze
column3: wɔnye hɔn dzi aperper."

column2: "Ebusuyɛfo nntse atsɛmbu ase: Na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE ekyir kwan no dze
column3: wɔtse adze nyina ase."

column2: "Ɔbɔbɔfo a ɔnam n’emudzi mu no ye Sen nyia ɔkyea wɔ n’akwan mu
column3: kansɛ ɔyɛ obirɛmpɔn mpo a."

column2: "Obiara a odzi mbra do no
column3: ɔyɛ ɔba nyansafo: Na nyia ɔnye etumfur fa nyɛnko no

column2: "Nyia ɔdze nsiho na apempensi dɔr n’ahodze no
column3: Ɔboaboa ano ma nyia ohu ɔbɔbɔfo mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Nyia ɔdan n’aso fi mbra ne tsie ho no
column3: Ne mpaabɔ mpo yɛ ekyiwadze."

column2: "Obiara a ɔma tɔɔtsenyɛnyi tɔ kwan bɔn mu dɔnsuar no
column3: Nankasa ɔbɔtɔ noara no mona no mu: Na hɔn a wodzi mu no dze

column2: "Ɔhonyanyi bu noara noho onyansafo; Na ɔbɔbɔfo a ɔwɔ ntseasee no
column3: ɔhwehwɛ no mu."

column2: "Sɛ atseneneefo dzi nyim a
column3: enyimnyam kɛse ba: Na sɛ emumuyɛfo soɛr dze a

column2: "Nyia ɔkata ne mbrato do no
column3: ɔnnkɛyɛ prɔmprɔm: Na obiara a ɔka to gua na ɔpow no

column2: "Ahomkanyi nye nyimpa a osuro noho daa no: Na nyia opirim n’akoma no dze
column3: ɔbɔtɔ mbusu mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ gyata a ɔropɔw
column3: na osisi a origyam tse no
column4: Dɛmara so na abɔbɔfo do ɔhen tsirmɔdzennyi tse."

column2: "Ɔhen a onnyi ntseasee no
column3: na ɔhyɛ atseetsee kɛse so: Na nyia okyir enyiber no dze

column2: "Nyimpa a wɔdze obi no bɔgyaa asoa no no
column3: Oboguan akɔtɔ mona mu; mma nyimpa biara nnsianka no."

column2: "Obiara a ɔnantsew tɔɔtsen no
column3: wɔbɛgye no nkwa
column4: Na nyia ɔkyeakyea wɔ n’akwan mu no dze

column2: "Nyia ɔdɔw n’asaase no
column3: obenya edziban pii: Na nyia odzi akwasampafo ekyir no dze

column2: "Ɔnokwafo ne nhyira bobu do: Na nyia ɔpɛ ntsɛm yɛ ɔhonyanyi no dze
column3: ɔnnkɛfa noho tɔtrɔtɔ."

column2: "Nyimpa enyimhwɛ nnye: Anaaso dɛ nyimpa bɔfom wɔ edziban sin ntsi."
"Nyia ɔwɔ enyiwa bɔn no
column3: ɔpɛ ntsɛm hwehwɛ ahonya
column4: Naaso onnyim dɛ ohia bɛba no do."

column2: "Nyia otwuw nyimpa enyim no
column3: n’ekyir no obenya enyimpa Asen nyia ɔdze ne tɛkyerɛma dzɛfɛdzɛfɛw no."

column2: "Obiara a owiawia n’egya anaa ne na
column3: na ɔdɛ
column5: no; Ɔno kor no ara ɔyɛ ɔsɛɛfo nyɛnko."

column2: "Nyia ɔwɔ edzifodzepɛ sunsum no
column3: okenyan mansotwe: Na nyia ɔdze no werɛ hyɛ EWURADZE mu no dze

column2: "Nyia ɔtwer nankasa n’akoma no
column3: ɔkwasea a: Na obiara a ɔnantsew nyansa mu no dze

column2: "Nyia ɔma ɔbɔbɔfo no
column3: onnkehia da: Na nyia ohuntsa n’enyiwa no dze

column2: "Sɛ emumuyɛfo soɛr a
column3: adasa dze hɔnho suma: Na sɛ wɔhera dze a
